title: Moneyboxx Finance to raise Rs 100 crore this fiscal, first tranche likely in May - Economic Times
content: Moneyboxx Finance to raise Rs 100 crore this fiscal, first tranche likely in May  Economic Times
description: The non-banking finance company plans to raise the capital in two phases. It is in the process of raising Rs 20 crore next month from high-net worth individuals. This would be followed by another Rs 80 crore equity raising later in the fiscal from institutional investors, said Deepak Aggarwal, co-founder and co-chief executive officer.
